# Visual Studio files
.vs/
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Build results
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
TestResults/
*.exe
*.dll
*.pdb
*.app/

# Rider files
RimWorldOfMagic/.idea/
*.sln.iml

# RimWorld specific (mod distribution outputs, auto-generated files)
About/Preview.png
About/About.xml~
Assemblies/ # Usually contains the compiled DLLs
*.mdb
*.bak

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
.packages/
**/packages/*

# OS generated
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
desktop.ini
ehthumbs.db

# Logs
*.log

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
*.cache
